content: This token can be used to access your account (<1>{{supportEmail}}</1>) via API calls. Don't share it with anyone. Make sure you copy this token now as you won't see it again.

comment.text: This translation key is used for a warning message that advises users not to share their API token and provides instructions on how to copy it. It appears in a generate developer token dialog, prompting users to take action before the token is lost.

usage.context:
<>
 <Text style={{ marginBottom: "16px" }}>
 <Trans
 t={t}
 ns="OAuth"
 i18nKey="GenerateTokenWarning"
 values={{
 supportEmail: email,
 }}
 components={{
 1: (

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The bracketed variable {{supportEmail}} is correctly placed, but consider standardizing placement across all translated strings for consistency.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: No change needed, but maintain consistency with other translations.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Tiliisi kirjautumiseen" (to log into your account) doesn't quite capture the meaning of "access your account" in the context of an API token. It implies regular login, which isn't the purpose of an API token.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Tätä tunnusta voidaan käyttää tilisi käyttöön API-kutsujen kautta.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of "API puheluiden kautta" is slightly less common than using the English loanword or a slightly different phrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Tätä tunnusta voidaan käyttää tilisi käyttöön API-kutsujen kautta.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'token' is used repeatedly. While acceptable, it might be more natural to use a more Armenian equivalent or alternate phrasing to avoid repetition.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using a more Armenian equivalent for 'token' or varying the sentence structure to avoid repetitive usage of 'token'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The email placeholder (<1>{{supportEmail}}</1>) appears consistently formatted, which is correct.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: N/A - Formatting is consistent.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "もう二度と表示されませんので" (mou nidoto hyouji saremasen node) is a bit clunky and overly formal. A more natural way to express "you won't see it again" would be something like "もう一度表示されません" (mou ichido hyouji shimasen) or "再表示されません" (sai-hyouji saremasen).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace "もう二度と表示されませんので" with "もう一度表示されません" or "再表示されません".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The addition of "保管してください" (hozon shite kudasai - 'please store') is not explicitly mentioned in the original English text. While storing is implied, adding it feels a little too prescriptive.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider removing "保管してください" to keep the translation closer to the original.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Korean translation retains the HTML-like tags (<1>{{supportEmail}}</1>) from the English content. These tags should be removed or replaced with appropriate formatting.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the tags: 이 토큰은 API 호출을 통해 계정({{supportEmail}})에 액세스하는 데 사용될 수 있습니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While generally correct, the phrase '또한 다시 볼 수 없을테니' (also, since you won't see it again) sounds slightly unnatural in Korean. A more natural phrasing emphasizing the importance of saving the token would be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 이 토큰은 다시 표시되지 않으니 지금 복사해 두세요.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ການໂທຫາ API" (calling API) is a less common and potentially confusing way to describe API calls in Lao. A more natural phrasing would be something like 'ການໃຊ້ງານ API' (using API) or 'ການເຊື່ອມຕໍ່ກັບ API' (connecting to API).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຕົວລະຫັດນີ້ສາມາດນໍາໃຊ້ເພື່ອເຂົ້າເຖິງບັນຊີຂອງທ່ານ (<1>{{supportEmail}}</1>) ຜ່ານການໃຊ້ງານ API.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word "marķieri" (marker) is used instead of "tālrunis" (token). While "marķieri" can sometimes refer to a token, in this context, it's confusing and inaccurate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Šo tālruni var izmantot, lai piekļūtu savam kontam...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Nedodiet to citiem' is a bit formal and less natural in this context. A more casual and direct phrasing would be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Neizdodiet to citiem.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Upewnij się, że skopiowano token teraz' is grammatically awkward. The passive voice sounds unnatural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Upewnij się, że skopiujesz token teraz.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'partilhe' (share) is slightly less common and formal than a more natural equivalent in this context. 'Compartilhe' would be more commonly used and sound more conversational.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Compartilhe

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'împărtășiți' should be 'împărtășiți'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: împărtășiți

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'nu-l veți mai putea găsi mai târziu' is a bit awkward and can be improved for clarity and naturalness.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: nu-l veți mai vedea

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'găsi' (find) is technically correct, 'vedea' (see) is a more natural and accurate translation of 'see' in this context, emphasizing the token's disappearance.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: nu-l veți mai vedea

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Sinhala translation retains the English HTML-like tags (<1>{{supportEmail}}</1>). These tags are unnecessary and should be removed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the tags <1>{{supportEmail}}</1> from the translation. The email address should be displayed directly.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'ඔබට මෙය නැවත දැකීමට නොහැකි නිසා' is slightly awkward. While grammatically correct, it can be phrased more naturally.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'ඔබට මෙය නැවත දැකීමට නොහැකි නිසා' with 'ඔබට මෙය නැවත නොපෙනෙනවා' or 'ඔබට මෙය නැවත නොᱧෙදෙනවා'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'lasneje' is incorrect and doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'again'. It appears to be a typo or a misunderstanding of the English word.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ne pozabite takoj kopirati tega žetona, saj ga ne boste več videli.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'belirteci' is a less common and slightly formal way to say 'token' in Turkish. 'Token' itself is widely understood and accepted, especially in technical contexts. Using 'belirteci' makes the sentence feel slightly unnatural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bu token, API çağrıları aracılığıyla hesabınıza (<1>{{supportEmail}}</1>) erişmek için kullanılabilir. Bunu kimseyle paylaşmayın. Bu token'ı bir daha görmeyeceğiniz için şimdi kopyaladığınızdan emin olun.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'bir daha görmeyeceğiniz için' is a bit wordy. A more concise and natural phrasing would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bu token, API çağrıları aracılığıyla hesabınıza (<1>{{supportEmail}}</1>) erişmek için kullanılabilir. Bunu kimseyle paylaşmayın. Bir daha görmeyeceğinizi unutmayın ve şimdi kopyalayın.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Ukrainian translation retains the HTML tags (<1> and </1>) from the English original. These should be removed or adapted for proper Ukrainian formatting, depending on the intended display.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the HTML tags or replace them with appropriate Ukrainian formatting tags (e.g., bolding or italics) if necessary.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "các cuộc gọi API" is a literal translation of "API calls" and sounds unnatural in Vietnamese. A more natural phrasing would be "kêu gọi API" or "yêu cầu API".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Mã token này có thể được sử dụng để truy cập tài khoản của bạn (<1>{{supportEmail}}</1>) thông qua các yêu cầu API.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, "Đừng chia sẻ mã với bất kỳ ai" is a bit stiff. A more conversational tone would be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Đừng chia sẻ mã này với bất kỳ ai.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Make sure you copy this token now as you won't see it again" is translated as "由于令牌不会再次显示，请立即复制此令牌." While technically correct, it's less natural and impactful in Chinese. A more natural phrasing would emphasize the one-time nature of the token.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: “由于此令牌仅显示一次，请务必立即复制它。” (Yinwei ci token jin xianshi yici, qing wu bi li ji fu zhi ta.) - This translates to: 'Because this token is only displayed once, be sure to copy it immediately.'
